name: nitro-splash-cli
description: CLI tool to generate responsive splash screen assets with LinearLayout support for React Native apps

scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate -c test/splash.config.json
scripts.test:advanced: npm run build && node dist/index.js advanced generate-themes -c test/splash.config.json -t light dark branded
scripts.test:validate: npm run build && node dist/index.js advanced validate
scripts.splash:demo: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate -c test/splash.config.json --verbose
